column5: Does anyone know where you can pick up some Woody's in western Ontario outside of the LCBO in Vermilion Bay? That is the only place we've got it before. Stuff is amazing and I'll be no where near VB for my second trip in August.

Have you tried calling LCBO's near where you will be?This is a couple years old but might explain why you are having trouble finding it. http://www.torontosun.com/2011/11/18...d-from-shelves woodyscanada.ca
You can access the LCBO online and they have stores and inventory available if you know what city you'd be purchasing in.http://www.lcbo.com/lcbo-ear/jsp/Pro...sp?language=ENBlair

Man, that stuff is good on a hot sunny day! Would probably lose our man card for walking around with one in our hand at home, but up in Canada those things are a refreshing change of pace on a hot day!
Consider your man card revoked.Signed,Bear GrylllsPresident of all things manly.
Awesome thanks for the links! Too bad there isn't anywhere I can buy it online. Crazy story about the glass in the drinks though.
Hilarious! Bear Grylls is a sissy boy and probably drinks Boone's Farm!
Who is this Bear Grylls? Never heard of her!
Unfortunately in Ontario the only place you can buy the hard booze and coolers is from the LCBO store or the LCBO rep stores.
